# Title Page

## Basic Core
### Managed Care Insurance Plans

---

# Introduction/Overview

## Overview of Basic Core and Basic Core-Plus Managed Care Insurance Plans
- Comparison of Basic Core and Basic Core-Plus plans.
- Immediate coverage with no waiting or exclusion periods for pre-existing conditions.
- Benefits include hospital admission, emergency room visits, urgent care, and physician office visits.
- Additional services: free prescription club, telemedicine services, and Medical Bill Repricer Services.
- Advocacy concierge services to navigate benefits, negotiate claims, and reduce out-of-pocket costs.

---

# Benefits and Features

## Medical Bill Repricer: Managed Care Solution
- Simplifies healthcare billing with Reference Based Pricing.
- Pays providers 150% to 200% of Medicare Allowable Rates.
- Doctor Office Visit: $25 pre-pay for primary care, $50 for specialists.
- Advocacy Service aids in understanding benefits and negotiating claims.

## Pharmacy Plan and Telemedicine Benefits
- Free acute and chronic medications, diabetic supplies, and pharmacy coaching.
- Personal member portal for managing prescriptions.
- Telemedicine: 24/7 virtual doctor consultations at no cost.

## Member Benefit Package Overview
- Cost-saving features: medical bill repricing, reference-based pricing, and advocacy services.
- Discount prescription program and mail order pharmacy service.
- Entertainment and wellness discounts.

---

# Plan Tiers

## Basic Core Plan
- Immediate coverage for pre-existing conditions.
- Benefits include hospital admission ($500/day for 1 day) and hospital daily confinement ($100/day for 10 days).
- Emergency room visits ($50/day for 1 day), urgent care ($50/day for 3 days), and physician office visits ($50/day for 3 days).
- Free prescription club with a discount Rx card.
- Telemedicine services not included.

## Basic Core-Plus Plan
- Includes all Basic Core Plan benefits.
- Additional benefits: unlimited virtual doctor visits at no cost.
- Free generic medications with no copay.
- Value-added services: diabetic supplies discounts, online health management, and alternative wellness therapies.

---

# Comparing Plans

## Comprehensive Overview of Basic Core and Plus Bundles
- Both plans include medical bill repricing, reference-based pricing, and advocacy services.
- Basic Core-Plus offers enhanced services: free prescription club, diabetic and medical supplies discounts, and alternative wellness therapies.
- Discount programs: prescription, mail order pharmacy, entertainment, and lab testing.

---

# Limitations and Exclusions

## Basic Core and Basic Core-Plus Plan Exclusions
- Neither plan covers pregnancy-related services.
- Specific financial limits on benefits such as hospital admission and daily confinement.

---

# Key Takeaways

## Summary of Benefits and Services
- Immediate coverage with no waiting periods.
- Comprehensive benefits including medical, pharmacy, and telemedicine services.
- Cost-saving measures through repricing and advocacy services.
- Enhanced offerings in the Basic Core-Plus plan for added convenience and savings.

---

# Thank You
